item.description:
Set in the very center of the West Hartford shopping and restaurant district, Barcelona is tucked behind a weathered wooden fence amid plenty of convenient parking.  Inside, dramatic artwork accents walnut and glass, and large private room separated by a 20-foot high barn door.  Above it all, a private wine room seats up to 14 people for intimate affairs.

This is where we will be experiencing it all ....if the weather complies we will sit on the patio.  A sumptuous dinner of suckling pig with all the trimmings (potato, seasonal veggies and flan, for your dessert)...$29 per person (excludes tax and tip. Half-price bottles of wine all night! Or choose tapas, whichever you prefer. Enjoy it all with a great glass of wine at 1/2 price off! Oh, what a night!!!

Come join us for this very special event and experience an adventure for the senses...Barcelona style!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or the Meetup Sign...

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Bienvenido!!! BARCELONA WINE & TAPAS BAR...Suckling Pig & Tapas Night!!!
